sn35.73:1.1: “Yo hi koci, bhikkhave, bhikkhu channam phassayatananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanati.
sn35.73:1.2: Avusitam tena brahmacariyam, araka so imasma dhammavinaya”ti.
sn35.73:2.1: Evam vutte, annataro bhikkhu bhagavantam etadavoca:
sn35.73:2.3: Ahanhi, bhante, channam phassayatananam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam nappajanami”ti.
sn35.73:5.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.73:7.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.73:11.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham va tam sukham va”ti?
sn35.73:13.1: “Yam pananiccam dukkham viparinamadhammam, kallam nu tam samanupassitum:
sn35.73:15.1: “Evam passam, bhikkhu, sutava ariyasavako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati, sotasmimpi nibbindati, ghanasmimpi nibbindati, jivhayapi nibbindati, kayasmimpi nibbindati, manasmimpi nibbindati.
sn35.73:15.2: Nibbindam virajjati; viraga vimuccati; vimuttasmim vimuttamiti nanam hoti.
sn35.73:15.3: ‘Khina jati, vusitam brahmacariyam, katam karaniyam, naparam itthattaya’ti pajanati”ti.
